text: juna manisaharumathi adesa pramanita bha'isakeko hunecha, uniharule javapha dine chanh ki he hamro palanakarta! Yi tinai hun, jasala'i hamile margavicalita gareka thiyaum. Hami tyastai uniharula'i pathavicalita gareka thi'em jasari hami aphai pathabhrasta thiyaum. Hamile timro sam'mukha aphno kura spasta garidiyaum, ki yiniharusita hamro kunai sambandha chaina ra yiniharule hamila'i puja gardainathe
